main.desc: onRuntime is a French-Canadian studio that brings together teams of creators and develops applications, websites and game platforms.

featured.title: Welcome to onRuntime Studio
featured.desc: Developers, designers and artists from all walks of life

about.title: We are a studio that brings together teams of creators
about.desc: Basically we have been passionate about web and software development for over 6 years. We are very interested in new technologies and the world of creation (design, music, etc.) in general, so we created a Studio and a community around that studio. We love to gather around a cup of coffee ☕️ to discuss, play and above all create projects.

projects.title: Latest Projects
projects.desc: Some innovative projects we've developed or contributed to in recent years.
